name: Decrease and Increase with Percentage Comparison
name_hi: प्रतिशत तुलना के साथ कमी और वृद्धि

signature.embedding_text: If decreasing X by x% gives same result as increasing by x% then x% of X is what % more than (x-X)% of X?

trick.name: Percentage Comparison Trick
trick.one_liner: Jab decrease aur increase same ho, toh x% nikalne ka shortcut

steps.action: Assume decrease and increase are equal
steps.action_hi: Maano ki kami aur badhoti barabar hai

trick.memory_hook: Decrease aur increase ko equal samjho, x% nikaalne ka shortcut yaad rakho!

common_mistakes.wrong: Using same percentage for both decrease and increase
common_mistakes.right: Calculate x% separately for decrease and increase
common_mistakes.why: Students often assume decrease and increase are directly proportional

deep.explanation: Yeh pattern percentage comparison ke liye hai jab decrease aur increase same result dete hain. Pehle, assume karo ki dono barabar hain aur x% ke liye solve karo. Phir, (x-10)% nikaalo aur compare karo. Isse aapko percentage difference samajhne mein madad milegi. Yeh trick aapko exam mein time bachane mein help karegi, kyunki aap directly x% nikaal sakte ho bina complex calculations ke. Common mistakes avoid karo jaise ki directly percentages ko equate karna bina solve kiye.

shortcut.explanation: Quickly assume equal decrease and increase, solve for x, then calculate (x-10)%

instant.explanation: Jab decrease aur increase equal ho, x% nikaalne ka shortcut use karo
